text: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: There is no limit to what we, as women, can accomplish.
author: Michelle Obama

text: I am a woman phenomenally. Phenomenal woman, that's me.
author: Maya Angelou

text: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: I’m not bossy, I’m the boss.
author: Beyoncé

text: We realize the importance of our voices only when we are silenced.
author: Malala Yousafzai

text: In the future, there will be no female leaders. There will just be leaders.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

text: I am lucky that whatever fear I have inside me, my desire to win is always stronger.
author: Serena Williams

text: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
author: Helen Keller

text: The most important thing is to be true to yourself, and those who care will never mind, and those who mind will never care.
author: Ariana Huffington
